value.title: Derry: Singer Roisin Quinn, who had stroke at 14, finds her voice again
value.excerpt: Now, four years on, Roisin has truly found her voice again. She is studying performing arts at Derry's North West Regional College and is choreographing a dance to reflect her journey. Later this month she will perform it at the Derry campus, where she has already starred in re-imaginings of Shakespeare's Romeo and Juliet and Macbeth.
